title: kaiyurai koNDu vandEn
sahitya:
kaiyurai koNDu vandEn murugA unaik-kaNDu nalam perum karuttuDan nAninru


anupallavi

  ayyanE unniDam aNuvumillAporuL mei varundiyE nAnum mIdiyAi aDai poruL


caraNam    nAn sheida pAvangaL navilavum ariyavAm nAtha ninnaDi malar nambiyE koNDu vandEn 
mAn sheida vaLLiyin manattiDai nIngAda marai mudarp-poruLE maruvEru maNIyE
